title: Video Making Competition
description: The IEEE-DBIT student branch organized a Video Making Competition on the 18th July, 2020 as a part of the NEXUS 2020 event. The competition aimed to help students showcase their video making skills and spread awareness about COVID-19.The topic given was:Salute to the front line warrior, Awareness about social distancing and safety practice, COVID-19 through a childâ€™s eyes, Life after COVID-19.
